entry.title: My Writing is in Disarray
entry.content: In some ways, the title says it all.
entry.summary: In some ways, the title says it all.

entry.title: My Blog
entry.content: As I continue to work with my files, I have been thinking a lot about this blog. I have entries that are over fifteen years old. Rereading these is entertaining. I remind myself of things that happened that I have forgotten. I suppose that is the point of writing: to make a record that I can refer to at some time in the future. But here’s the thing: Is anyone going to scroll back that far to read these entries?
entry.summary: As I continue to work with my files, I have been thinking a lot about this blog. I have entries that are over fifteen years old. Rereading these is entertaining. entry.title: Great Day
entry.content: Today is a great day for Nick and me.
entry.summary: Today is a great day for Nick and me.
